## TunnelOpts.transferables property

Optional function to extract transferables from incoming stream values, e.g. ArrayBuffers. See: [https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Worker/postMessage](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Worker/postMessage)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transferables?: Fn<A, any[]>;
```
